label: Classe Moderne

environment.setting: Modern European classroom with contemporary furniture
environment.background: Educational posters, whiteboard, windows with natural light
environment.props: Other school furniture, storage units, educational materials on shelves

composition.camera_angle: Eye-level or slightly above (20 degrees), three-quarter view showing furniture dimensions
composition.framing: Furniture piece in context, showing scale relative to room and other objects
composition.depth_of_field: Moderate, furniture sharp, room context present but softer

lighting_override.direction: Large window natural light combined with overhead institutional lighting

proportion_notes: Show furniture at realistic scale relative to standard classroom dimensions. Include reference objects (door frame, desk, chair) for size context.

label: Salle de Jeux

environment.setting: Children's playroom with soft, child-friendly design
environment.background: Pastel walls, playful but tasteful decor, storage bins
environment.surface: Soft play mat or clean wooden floor
environment.props: Toys, cushions, other child furniture, brick red accents in decor

composition.camera_angle: Child's eye-level (low angle, 60-80cm height), showing furniture as children see it
composition.framing: Furniture as part of play environment, showing functionality
composition.depth_of_field: Moderate, furniture in focus, playful context visible

lighting_override.direction: Bright, warm natural light from windows

proportion_notes: Show furniture at child-appropriate scale. If possible, suggest child-sized proportions by including toys or child-height references.

label: Coin Calme

environment.setting: Quiet corner with comfortable seating and warm atmosphere
environment.background: Warm-toned wall, low bookshelf, indoor plant
environment.props: Bean bags, floor cushions, low shelves with books, soft lighting elements

composition.camera_angle: Low angle (ground level to 30 degrees), intimate and inviting
composition.framing: Furniture as anchor piece of the calm corner, surrounded by comfort elements
composition.depth_of_field: Shallow, furniture sharp, cozy surroundings gently blurred

lighting_override.direction: Golden hour window light, warm and directional

proportion_notes: Ensure furniture appears stable, grounded, and appropriately sized for the quiet corner setting.

label: Bureau Enseignant

environment.background: Office elements: filing cabinet, bookshelf, diplomas or educational materials
environment.props: Desk organizer, laptop or notebook, coffee mug, professional items

composition.camera_angle: Eye-level (adult height), straight-on or slight three-quarter angle
composition.framing: Furniture in professional workspace context, showing adult-scale functionality
composition.depth_of_field: Moderate, sharp furniture with soft office background

lighting_override.direction: Office window light combined with desk lamp warmth

proportion_notes: Show furniture at adult scale. Include adult-sized references (office chair, standard desk) to establish correct proportions.

label: Creche

environment.setting: Nursery or daycare setting with very gentle, safe atmosphere
environment.background: Soft pastel walls, natural wood elements, safety-conscious design
environment.surface: Soft, safe flooring (cork, rubber play mat, carpet)
environment.props: Natural materials (wooden toys, cotton items), safety elements, small plants

composition.camera_angle: Low angle (child/toddler height, 30-50cm), showing furniture from small child perspective
composition.framing: Furniture as safe, welcoming element in nurturing space
composition.depth_of_field: Soft overall, dreamy quality, furniture in focus

lighting_override.direction: Very soft, diffused natural light, no harsh contrasts

proportion_notes: Furniture must appear safe and correctly sized for toddlers/infants. Show rounded edges, stable base, and appropriate height for very young children.

label: Minimaliste

environment.background: Solid Sola beige (#F9F7F4) or clean white, seamless backdrop
environment.surface: Clean floor matching background or slight contrast

composition.camera_angle: Three-quarter view at eye-level, showing depth and proportions clearly
composition.framing: Furniture centered with generous negative space, focus purely on form and design
composition.depth_of_field: Sharp throughout, showcasing every design detail

lighting_override.direction: Studio lighting: key light from 45 degrees left, fill from right, rim light for edge definition
lighting_override.shadows: Clean, defined shadow beneath furniture for grounding

proportion_notes: With no environmental references, ensure furniture proportions are absolutely accurate. Maintain correct height-to-width-to-depth ratios.
